item.title: Manjaka x Lokana
item.description: This pairing was between our F1 sire from Colorado Chameleons, Manjaka, and our female from Chromatic Chameleons, Lokana. Lokana is a mix of Chromatic and Kammerflage Kreations yellow-bodied blue bar Ambilobe while Manjaka is a wonderful YBBB from a recent import, WC Arlo. The outcomes have been extremely consiste YBBB thus far which are not directly related to our main line of Ambilobe. They are a great option for people looking for high quality pairings with our multi-generational lines.

item.title: Ranoka
item.description: Ranoka is a really interesting mix of F1 Manjaka and Kromatisk, Lokana’s sire. He has the radiant yellow that Manjaka has, but he also has the red embers at the edge of the yellow like Kromatisk - this almost looks orange at times and gives it an almost 3D look against a blue background. Really unique animal! Ranoka Ranoka1 Ranoka2 Ranoka3 Ranoka4 Ranoka5 Ranoka6 Ranoka7 Ranoka8 Filial F2-CG14 Sire Manjaka Dam Lokana 5 Generation Tree

item.title: Tsara
item.description: Tsara Tarehy means attractive in Malagasy. We named the two sisters from Manjaka x Lokana Tsara and Tarehy :). Check out that clutch to see how consistent their YBBB phenotypes were. It is a very good proxy for what these two sisters bring to the table: great yellows and bars that shift from Landy to Manjaka’s blues. Very good complement to our existing lines! Tsara Tsara1 Tsara2 Filial F2-CG14 Sire Manjaka Dam Lokana 5 Generation Tree

item.title: Tarehy
item.description: Tsara Tarehy means attractive in Malagasy. We named the two sisters from Manjaka x Lokana Tsara and Tarehy :). Check out that clutch to see how consistent their YBBB phenotypes were. It is a very good proxy for what these two sisters bring to the table: great yellows and bars that shift from Landy to Manjaka’s blues. Very good complement to our existing lines! Tarehy Tarehy1 Tarehy2 Filial F2-CG14 Sire Manjaka Dam Lokana 5 Generation Tree

item.title: Mami
item.description: Mami is one of our 5th generation HB females from Papafee x Lokana. She has more purples and pinks like her mother, Lokana, whereas her two sisters Vaosary and Bumble Bee remind me of their aunts, Papafee’s sisters. Her first pairing is with our new WC Ambilobe, so we expect her to produce some absolutely amazing F1 YBBB Ambilobe for us! Mami Mami1 Mami2 Filial F4-CG14 Sire Papafee Dam Lokana 5 Generation Tree

item.title: Papamavo
item.description: Papamavo is one of our 5th generation Ambilobe Panther Chameleon breeders from Papafee x Lokana. He has great vibrancy and a solid yellow body. His attitude is a bit more feisty than his father, but he’s calming down a bit now as he reaches adulthood. We are excited to see what he does for us! Papamavo Papamavo1 Papamavo2 Papamavo3 Papamavo4 Papamavo5 Papamavo6 Papamavo7 Papamavo8 Filial F4-CG14 Sire Papafee Dam Lokana 5 Generation Tree

item.title: Vaosary
item.description: Vaosary is one of our 5th generation HB females from Papafee x Lokana. She has a rusty coloration with even more orange than her sister Bumble Bee. Her first pairing is with our new WC Ambilobe, so we expect her to produce some absolutely amazing F1 YBBB Ambilobe for us! Vaosary Vaosary1 Vaosary2 Filial F4-CG14 Sire Papafee Dam Lokana 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Vaosary (F4-CG14) Generation 1 1.

item.title: Bumble Bee
item.description: Bumble Bee is one of our 5th generation HB females from Papafee x Lokana. She has a great personality and a rusty coloration with lots of orange and light purple dots. We expect her to produce some absolutely amazing Ambilobe for us! Bumblebee Bumblebee1 Bumblebee2 Bumblebee3 Filial F4-CG14 Sire Papafee Dam Lokana 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Bumble Bee (F4-CG14) Generation 1 1. Bumble Bee (F4-CG14). Bumble Bee was born on 2022-01-11 at iPardalis.

item.title: Papafee x Lokana
item.description: This pairing was between our fourth generation hold back, Papafee, and our Ambilobe female from Chromatic Chameleons, Lokana. Lokana is from a great pairing between Kromatisk and Shirley. Kromatisk is one of my favorite Ambilobe breeders in the USA and Shirley is from one of my favorite ybbb combinations from Kammerflage Kreations. Papafee is the HB male from our Zanaka x Sunny clutch. His yellows are my favorite from the fourth generation.

item.title: lokana
item.description: Lokana is the half-sister of Loko. They each have a 50% chance of bringing Kromatisk’s amazing ybbb into our project, but Lokana also has Landy x Hamy from her dam, Shirley’s side. Really can’t go wrong with the two possibilities here. We are very excited to see how she proves out over the years :). Lokana mtDNA Haplogroup* 3 (Ambilobe East) Filial F9-CG13 Sire Kromatisk Dam Shirley *preliminary results

item.title: Lineage: Chromatic Chameleons
item.description: Chromatic Chameleons Felipe Sanchez Sire WC Bolt Dam Cowboy’s daughter Felipe Felipe1 Felipe2 Felipe3 Capella Sire Felipe Sanchez Dam JJ’s Daughter Capella Capella1 Capella2 Capella3 Kromatisk Sire JJ Dam Daisy Kromatisk Kromatisk1 Kromatisk2 Kromatisk3 Jackie Sire Wet Dream Dam Marley’s Daughter Shirley Sire Landy (Silk) Dam Hamy (Sweetness) Daisy Sire Seventeen Dam Dio’s daughter JJ’s Daughter Sire JJ Dam Daisy Kromatisk’s Daughter Sire Kromatisk Dam Xanthos’ daughter Xanthos’ Daughter Sire Xanthos Dam Sienna Xanthos Sire Unknown Dam Unknown Xanthos
